description:
The story centers on Akira Ono, a regular guy who works at a company that manages an online game. He often plays the game as his character "Maou" (Dark Lord). But one day, when he logs on, he is whisked into the game's fantasy world as his character. There, he meets a one-legged girl, and begins his adventures alongside her. But as he is a powerful "Dark Lord," various nations and holy maidens journey to defeat him, and he stirs up trouble everywhere he goes.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: จอมมารรีไทร์

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

name.native: エンジェル・ホワイト

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ogata_kouji)

Born in 1970, a native of Osaka, Kouji Ogata spent his early twenties struggling to get enough credits to graduate from Osaka Design School. In late 1996, Ogata-sensei was commissioned by Media Works to illustrate the first Boogiepop novel, Boogiepop and Others.

At the time, Ogata-sensei was simply a rising star with a distinctive, eye-catching art style, but he was gradually able to further hone his artistic skills with each subsequent work. His watercolor-style paneling seen in the two-volume Boogiepop Doesn’t Laugh manga series was a particularly high point of his early career.

In addition to providing illustrations for novels and manga, Ogata-sensei has been involved with supplying character designs for anime productions including Boogiepop Phantom, Spirit, and Gin-iro no kami no Agito.

In his free time, he enjoys motorcycles, tennis, and remote-controlled models.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

__Height:__ 153cm

[Profile (Style Cube)](http://stylecube.jp/talents/kaori/index.html) | [Website](http://ishiharakaori.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaori_staff_) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/ishiharakaori/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ishiharakaori_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kaori_ishihara)

She won the award of Best Rookie Actress in the 7th Seiyuu Awards. She was a founding member of the group [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177), before her graduation from the group on April 20, 2013. She was one half of J-Pop duo [YuiKaori](https://anilist.co/staff/195974/), along with [Yui Ogura](https://anilist.co/staff/105981/) before the group disbanded in 2017.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Frima - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Soldier EG - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Tiara - Fairy Fencer F (VG)

[Website](http://tojoharuka.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tojoharuka)

She made her debut when she was only 16 years old.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/jonasfalcao82/)

Jonas Falcão is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director and singer.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/augusto.de.souza/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/augusto_dubla) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/augustodesouza.ator) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@augustodesouza2335) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@guto_dubla) | [Official Website](https://augustodesouza.wixsite.com/site)

Felipe Augusto de Souza is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and sound technician.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- José Santos (Metal Revolution)
- al-Mutawakkil (Assassin's Creed Mirage)
- Kunal Dudheker (Silicon Valley)
- Tenakth Rebels (Horizon Forbidden West)
- Droids BX and Droids B2 (Star Wars Jedi: Survivor)
!~
Kristoffer Romo is a Mexican voice actor.
